FROM "documents"
WHERE contains(documents, "F-043")
SORT title ASC

## ðŸŽ¯ Related Decisions

```dataview
TABLE title as "Decision", status as "Status", decided_on as "Date"
FROM "decisions"
WHERE contains(affects, "F-043")
SORT decided_on DESC
```
